projects.title: Deep Hierarchical Variational Autoencoder-based World Models for RL Environments
projects.description: Developed advanced reinforcement learning models by leveraging NVAE in World Models, achieving a 45% performance boost in Dream Car Racing-v2, baseline parity in Car Racing-v2, and 95% success in Panda-Gym reach tasks.

projects.title: Diabetes Prediction
projects.description: Designed a diabetes prediction system using the PIMA dataset, leveraging and evaluating machine learning algorithms, with Random Forest demonstrating superior reliability in predicting diabetes risk.

projects.title: Email Spam Classification
projects.description: Implemented Gaussian Naive Bayes on the Spam-base dataset, achieving 85% accuracy in spam detection, with performance insights visualized through a Confusion Matrix.

projects.title: K-Pop Music Recommendation System
projects.description: Built a K-Pop Music Recommendation System using Spotify Web API and hybrid techniques, boosting user engagement by 20% with a Streamlit interface for seamless, personalized genre and track selection.

projects.title: Deep Learning-Based Spatial Detection of Drainage Structures (Culverts)
projects.description: Conducted advanced object detection research on culverts, analyzing 6,000 spatial samples across four U.S. states, and implemented DINO (ResNet 50) to achieve 77% accuracy, outperforming Faster RCNN, DETR, and YOLO in comparative analysis.

projects.title: Image Captioning using CNN and Transformer Model
projects.description: Developed an advanced image captioning system combining CNNs for feature extraction and an Attention-based Transformer for language generation, achieving a ROUGE score of 0.8 on the Flickr 8K dataset for highly precise captions.

projects.title: Text Summarization Using LSTM and Hugging Face Models
projects.description: Engineered an LSTM-based Seq2Seq model for abstractive text summarization on the CNN Daily News dataset, achieving a ROUGE score of 0.75, and implemented Pegasus and BART for movie plot summarization, with Pegasus achieving a superior ROUGE score of 0.8.

projects.title: Balance Cart-Pole with Qlearning & DQN
projects.description: Applied Q-Learning and Deep Q-Networks (DQN) to solve the Cart-Pole-v0 problem, achieving a 60% improvement in balance performance with DQN over traditional Q-Learning.

projects.title: System Monitor
projects.description: Created a real-time system monitor in C++ with ncurses for efficient tracking of CPU, memory, and processes, enhancing monitoring by 25% and reducing development time by 30% with automated Makefile processes.

projects.title: Traffic Simulation
projects.description: Designed a multi-threaded traffic flow simulator in C++ to improve computational efficiency by 40%, leveraging OpenCV for enhanced traffic visualization, boosting management insights by 35%.

projects.title: Chatbot
projects.description: Built an advanced C++ chatbot with graph-based knowledge representation, achieving 90% query resolution accuracy and optimizing memory management with raw pointers to enhance efficiency by 20%.

projects.title: Street Route Planner
projects.description: Developed a high-performance street route planner using OpenStreetMap and IO2D, integrating the A* algorithm in C++ to boost routing efficiency by 15% with visually accurate path rendering.
